1: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal b'eyc'ojlej in, ala to may in mul, coln 'el 'a yol sc'ab' eb' 'anma 'a'm 'es yet' 'a eb' tu sb'eyb'al.</t>
2: <t>In Colmal aji, ¿tas yuj najt tzin ejcn 'el 'a ojltac? ¿Tas yuj cusc'ojlaln̈ej wec' yuj eb' 'ajc'ojl yajch 'ayin?</t>
3: <pb/><t>Ch'ox a sacq'uinlal 'ayin yet' a paxti caw yel, sec wach' a 'oj in ch'oxn 'a a b'e tzc'och 'a lum tzaln yic 'emmquilal 'a 'ajtil cajn ach 'eq'ui.</t>
4: <t>Ach in Diosal, 'oj in c'och 'a 'aj 'ay yet'l a xajmb'al, ata 'oj ach in b'itnoc yet' arpa, yujto in Diosal ach, 'ac' in tzaljc'ojlal.</t>
5: <pb/><t>¿Tas wal yuj tzjaw in chab'c'ojlal? ¿Tas yuj tzsomchj chan̈ in nab'en? Ach in Diosal tzach wa'ch yipc in c'ojol, a 'aych 'oj wal wach' paxti'. In Colmal aji, in Diosal ach paxi.</t>
